sentence.Network_en: Liberia was never colonised by the European powers.
sentence.Network_cn: 利比里亚从未沦落为欧洲强国的殖民地。

sentence.Network_en: Rebels in Liberia have released four foreigners after holding them captive for a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 利比里亚的叛乱分子释放了4名被扣押了一个星期的外国人。

sentence.Network_en: The disruption has now spread and is affecting a large part of central Liberia.
sentence.Network_cn: 混乱局面已经扩散，正在影响利比里亚中部的大片地区。

list.abs: 实用资料 - 世界各国首都 ... 弗里敦 Freetown 利比里亚 Republic of Liberia 蒙罗维亚 Monrovia.
位于西非的赖比瑞亚共和国（Republic of Liberia）首都蒙罗维亚（Monrovia）有一块大黑板，上头所写的内容分享了各种新闻讯息。 …

means.word_mean: 1. a republic in West Africa; established in 1822 by Americans as a way to free negro slaves
